import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./Main.css"; import { booleanTypeAnnotation } from "@babel/types"; export default function Main() { let [operacao, setOperacao] = useState(""); let [historico, setHistorico] = useState(""); function botao(value) { return ( ); } function adicionaValor(event) { setOperacao(operacao + event.target.value); setHistorico(historico + event.target.value); } function zeraValor() { setOperacao(""); setHistorico(""); } function fazCalculo() { setOperacao(eval(operacao)); setHistorico(historico + `=${eval(operacao)}`); } return (
{operacao}
{historico}
); }
